languages.text: Райкад Минорис встретил Лорд-капитана не фанфарами и пышным парадом, а выстрелами и грохотом битвы. Впрочем, это не меняет цели, с которой Вольный Торговец прибыл{mf||а} на планету — е{mf|му|й} по-прежнему необходимо отыскать губернатора этого мира и затребовать у него необходимые кораблю ресурсы.

Rykad Minoris welcomed the Lord Captain not with fanfare and a grand parade, but with explosions and the sounds of battle. Still, this changes nothing — the Rogue Trader still needs to find this world's governor and request the necessary supplies and crew for {mf|his|her} voidship.
languages.original_text: Райкад Минорис встретил Лорд-капитана не фанфарами и пышным парадом, а выстрелами и грохотом битвы. Впрочем, это не меняет цели, с которой Вольный Торговец прибыл{mf||а} на планету — е{mf|му|й} по-прежнему необходимо отыскать губернатора этого мира и затребовать у него необходимые кораблю ресурсы.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris met the Lord Captain not with fanfare and a pompous parade but with explosions and sounds of battle. Still, this changes nothing — the Rogue Trader still needs to find this world's governor and request the necessary supplies and crew for {mf|his|her} voidship.

Rykad Minoris welcomed the Lord Captain not with fanfare and a grand parade, but with explosions and the sounds of battle. Still, this changes nothing — the Rogue Trader still needs to find this world's governor and request the necessary supplies and crew for {mf|his|her} voidship.

Rykad Minoris welcomed the Lord Captain not with fanfare and a grand parade, but with explosions and the sounds of battle. Still, this changes nothing — the Rogue Trader still needs to find this world's governor and request the necessary supplies and crew for {mf|his|her} voidship.

languages.text: Rykad Minoris hat den Lord Captain nicht mit Fanfaren und einer großen Parade empfangen, sondern mit Explosionen und Kampflärm. Aber das ändert nichts – {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} muss trotzdem den Gouverneur dieser Welt finden und die erforderlichen Vorräte und Crewmitglieder für {mf|sein|ihr} Raumschiff einfordern.
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris welcomed the Lord Captain not with fanfare and a grand parade, but with explosions and the sounds of battle. Still, this changes nothing — the Rogue Trader still needs to find this world's governor and request the necessary supplies and crew for {mf|his|her} voidship.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris hat den Lord Captain nicht mit Fanfaren und einer großen Parade empfangen, sondern mit Explosionen und Kampflärm. Aber das ändert nichts – {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} muss trotzdem den Gouverneur dieser Welt finden und die erforderlichen Vorräte und Crewmitglieder für {mf|sein|ihr} Raumschiff einfordern.

languages.text: Rykad Minoris a accueilli {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} non pas avec une fanfare et un beau défilé, mais avec des explosions et le vacarme des combats. Non que cela change quoi que ce soit : {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit trouver le gouverneur de cette planète et réquisitionner les ressources matérielles comme humaines nécessaires à son vaisseau.
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris welcomed the Lord Captain not with fanfare and a grand parade, but with explosions and the sounds of battle. Still, this changes nothing — the Rogue Trader still needs to find this world's governor and request the necessary supplies and crew for {mf|his|her} voidship.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris a accueilli {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} non pas avec une fanfare et un beau défilé, mais avec des explosions et le vacarme des combats. Non que cela change quoi que ce soit : {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit trouver le gouverneur de cette planète et réquisitionner les ressources matérielles comme humaines nécessaires à son vaisseau.

languages.text: ライカド・ミノリスはファンファーレや華やかなパレードではなく、爆発音と戦闘音でロード・キャプテンを出迎えた。しかしこれで何かが変わるわけではない。なおも自由開拓者はこの惑星の総督を見つけ、ヴォイドシップに必要な物資とクルーを要請しなければならない。
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris welcomed the Lord Captain not with fanfare and a grand parade, but with explosions and the sounds of battle. Still, this changes nothing — the Rogue Trader still needs to find this world's governor and request the necessary supplies and crew for {mf|his|her} voidship.

traits.locale_text: ライカド・ミノリスはファンファーレや華やかなパレードではなく、爆発音と戦闘音でロード・キャプテンを出迎えた。しかしこれで何かが変わるわけではない。なおも自由開拓者はこの惑星の総督を見つけ、ヴォイドシップに必要な物資とクルーを要請しなければならない。

languages.text: Rykad Minoris no ha recibido a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán con un gran desfile y ostentación, sino con explosiones y ruidos de combate. Sin embargo, eso no cambia que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente necesita encontrar al gobernador del planeta y solicitar los suministros y tripulantes que su nave del vacío necesita.
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris welcomed the Lord Captain not with fanfare and a grand parade, but with explosions and the sounds of battle. Still, this changes nothing — the Rogue Trader still needs to find this world's governor and request the necessary supplies and crew for {mf|his|her} voidship.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris no ha recibido a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán con un gran desfile y ostentación, sino con explosiones y ruidos de combate. Sin embargo, eso no cambia que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente necesita encontrar al gobernador del planeta y solicitar los suministros y tripulantes que su nave del vacío necesita.

languages.text: 小莱卡德欢迎领主舰长的方式并不是欢庆典礼与盛大的游行，而是爆炸声和战斗声。然而，要做的事情并没有变。行商浪人依然需要找到这个世界的总督，要求总督为虚空舰提供必要的船员与补给。
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris welcomed the Lord Captain not with fanfare and a grand parade, but with explosions and the sounds of battle. Still, this changes nothing — the Rogue Trader still needs to find this world's governor and request the necessary supplies and crew for {mf|his|her} voidship.

traits.locale_text: 小莱卡德欢迎领主舰长的方式并不是欢庆典礼与盛大的游行，而是爆炸声和战斗声。然而，要做的事情并没有变。行商浪人依然需要找到这个世界的总督，要求总督为虚空舰提供必要的船员与补给。

languages.text: Rykad Minoris, Lord Kaptan'ı davullar ve geçit törenleriyle değil, patlamalar ve savaş sesleriyle karşıladı. Yine de değişen bir şey yok. Hür Tacir'in hâlen bu dünyanın valisini bulması ve uçsuz gemisi için gerekli olan mürettebat ve erzakı talep etmesi gerekiyor.
languages.original_text: Rykad Minoris welcomed the Lord Captain not with fanfare and a grand parade, but with explosions and the sounds of battle. Still, this changes nothing — the Rogue Trader still needs to find this world's governor and request the necessary supplies and crew for {mf|his|her} voidship.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris, Lord Kaptan'ı davullar ve geçit törenleriyle değil, patlamalar ve savaş sesleriyle karşıladı. Yine de değişen bir şey yok. Hür Tacir'in hâlen bu dünyanın valisini bulması ve uçsuz gemisi için gerekli olan mürettebat ve erzağı talep etmesi gerekiyor.
